content:
Cross-posting from here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Broken.20Package.20Dependency.20in.20PDEX.20Package

The hl7.fhir.us.davinci-pdex-plan-net#0.1.0 as obtained from packages.fhir.org contains a dependency on hl7.fhir.core#4.0.0. Looking at the hl7.fhir.core package summary, that version doesn't exist: http://packages.fhir.org/hl7.fhir.core

In the other topic I'm asking about what HAPI should do, but in this topic could I make a request to have the broken dependency version fixed in the PDEX package? IMO PDEX should depend on 4.0.x and not on a specific point version.
